Uses of Package
myVelib.userAndCard

  • Packages that use myVelib.userAndCard 
    Package Description
    myVelib.bike  
    myVelib.cardFactory  
    myVelib.station  
    myVelib.system  
    myVelib.userAndCard  
  • Classes in myVelib.userAndCard used by myVelib.bike 
    Class and Description
    User
    The class User is a central point of the program : it contains the id, the name, the total amount charged, the total riding time, the current ride (if there is one), the card, the current position.
  • Classes in myVelib.userAndCard used by myVelib.cardFactory 
    Class and Description
    Card
    The interface Card declares the common methods to compute ride price and add time credit when arriving to a plus station
    NoCard
    NoCard class is used when the user has no card and has to pay the max charges
    Vlibre
    Vlibre class represents the card Vlibre and its rules for computing prices
    Vmax
    Vmax class represents the card Vmax and its rules for computing prices
  • Classes in myVelib.userAndCard used by myVelib.station 
    Class and Description
    User
    The class User is a central point of the program : it contains the id, the name, the total amount charged, the total riding time, the current ride (if there is one), the card, the current position.
  • Classes in myVelib.userAndCard used by myVelib.system 
    Class and Description
    User
    The class User is a central point of the program : it contains the id, the name, the total amount charged, the total riding time, the current ride (if there is one), the card, the current position.
  • Classes in myVelib.userAndCard used by myVelib.userAndCard 
    Class and Description
    Card
    The interface Card declares the common methods to compute ride price and add time credit when arriving to a plus station
    UserIdGenerator
    The generator is used to compute automatically the next user id when calling the constructor
